אִיכָּא דְּאָמְרִי.text: The Aramaic phrase אִיכָּא דְּאָמְרִי literally means “there are those who say.”

tokensOfLine.text: It is used in Gemara to introduce an alternative version of the Talmudic discussion, either a different version of what earlier authorities said, or a different discussion of the question considering different arguments.
